title: Switch Chrome proxy to HTTP
description: Update jobs-scout to use HTTP/HTTPS proxy for Chrome instead of SOCKS5.

title: Ensure chrome closes on crawl abort
description: Wrap crawl in try/finally and close Chrome by port and user-data-dir when errors/abort occur.

title: Add puppeteer launch smoke script
description: Add minimal launch script under apps/jobs-scout for crashpad testing.

title: Create skill for node+LLM web automation workflow
Add filter for open jobs only
description: Add UI toggle to only show non-expired jobs in recommendations.

title: Prefer headless chrome to isolate crawler
description: Launch headless Chrome when headless is enabled; fallback to open if needed.

title: Fix jobs-scout ESM __dirname crash
description: Electron main.js uses __dirname in ESM; add fileURLToPath-based __dirname.

title: Add jobs crawler Electron app
description: Build a separate Electron app to crawl letsgetrusty jobs, resolve apply links, extract descriptions via LLM, manage resume upload, and recommend jobs.

title: Handle navigation timeouts in jobs crawl
description: Crawler times out on page navigation; add retries and use domcontentloaded with higher timeouts.

title: Log headless flags in puppeteer smoke
description: Update pp-launch.js to explicitly set headless flag and print spawnargs for verification.
